title: Jesse Gary, Century’s President and CEO, to participate in conference hosted by BMO

contentObject.content: CHICAGO, Feb.  28, 2022  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Century Aluminum Company (NASDAQ: CENX) announced today that Jesse Gary, Century’s President and Chief Executive Officer, will participate in presentation followed by a question and answer session at the BMO Global Metals & Mining Conference, beginning at approximately 2:30 p.m. EST on Tuesday, March 1, 2022.
A real-time audio webcast of this session will be available on the “Investors” section of Century’s website

A slide presentation, to be used in connection with the conference and investor meetings, will be made available on the “Investors” section of the Company’s website approximately one hour before the scheduled presentation.
Century Aluminum Company owns primary aluminum capacity in the United States and Iceland. Century's corporate offices are located in Chicago, IL. Visit
